<style type="text/css">
.a-stats {
	width: auto;
}
.a-stats a {
	background: #7CA821;
	background-image:-moz-linear-gradient(0% 100% 90deg,#5F8E14,#7CA821);
	background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear,0% 0,0% 100%,from(#7CA821),to(#5F8E14));
	border: 1px solid #5F8E14;
	border-radius:3px;
	color: #CFEA93;
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	font-weight: normal;
	height: 100%;
	-moz-border-radius:3px;
	padding: 7px 0 8px;
	text-align: center;
	text-decoration: none;
	-webkit-border-radius:3px;
	width: 100%;
}
.a-stats a:hover {
	text-decoration: none;
	background-image:-moz-linear-gradient(0% 100% 90deg,#6F9C1B,#659417);
	background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear,0% 0,0% 100%,from(#659417),to(#6F9C1B));
}
.a-stats .count {
	color: #FFF;
	display: block;
	font-size: 15px;
	line-height: 16px;
	padding: 0 13px;
	white-space: nowrap;
}
</style>

<article id="post-4710" class="post-4710 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-diabetes tag-causes-of-diabetes tag-diabetes-2 tag-type-1-diabetes">
	
	<header class="entry-header">
				<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="cat-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/diabetes/" rel="category tag">Diabetes</a></span>
		</div>
		<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/15/causes-of-type-1-diabetes-2/" rel="bookmark">Causes of Type 1 Diabetes</a></h1>
		<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="entry-date"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/15/causes-of-type-1-diabetes-2/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2015-08-15T13:15:46+00:00">August 15, 2015</time></a></span> <span class="byline"><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/author/capitalistpigletatt/" rel="author">Syndicated Article</a></span></span>			<span class="comments-link"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/15/causes-of-type-1-diabetes-2/#respond">Leave a comment</a></span>
					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

		<div class="entry-content">
		<p>By Bill Jones</p>
<p>The elements that cause diabetes type one includes a large number of possibilities, from the environmental to autoimmune. Type one diabetes is often referred to as juvenile diabetes along with IDDM, and is an acronym for ‘Insulin Dependent Diabetes Mellitus,’ simply because the affected individual will have to be treated by means of insulin injections.</p>
<p><a href="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/type-1-diabetes-graph.jpg"><img class="alignright size-medium wp-image-4714" src="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/type-1-diabetes-graph.jpg?w=300&h=187" alt="Type-1-Diabetes-graph" width="300" height="187" srcset="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/type-1-diabetes-graph.jpg?w=300&h=187 300w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/type-1-diabetes-graph.jpg?w=600&h=374 600w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/type-1-diabetes-graph.jpg?w=150&h=94 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></a><br />
This is the result of injury to most of the beta cells within your pancreas which usually creates insulin. In cases where these cells are destroyed, the pancreas will not be able to manufacture insulin any longer, and as a consequence it is going to have to be given via injections.</p>
<p> <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/15/causes-of-type-1-diabetes-2/#more-4710" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="screen-reader-text">Causes of Type 1 Diabetes</span> <span class="meta-nav">→</span></a></p>
	</div><!-- .entry-content -->
	
	<footer class="entry-meta"><span class="tag-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/causes-of-diabetes/" rel="tag">causes of diabetes</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/diabetes-2/" rel="tag">diabetes</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/type-1-diabetes/" rel="tag">type 1 diabetes</a></span></footer></article><!-- #post-## -->

<article id="post-4705" class="post-4705 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-fitness category-weight-loss tag-fitness-2 tag-muscle-tone tag-physical-exercise tag-weight-loss-2 tag-weight-training">
	
	<header class="entry-header">
				<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="cat-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/fitness/" rel="category tag">Fitness</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/weight-loss/" rel="category tag">Weight Loss</a></span>
		</div>
		<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/06/five-ways-to-burn-more-fat-tone-muscle-with-weight-training/" rel="bookmark">Five Ways to Burn More Fat & Tone Muscle With Weight Training</a></h1>
		<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="entry-date"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/06/five-ways-to-burn-more-fat-tone-muscle-with-weight-training/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2015-08-06T16:54:08+00:00">August 6, 2015</time></a></span> <span class="byline"><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/author/capitalistpigletatt/" rel="author">Syndicated Article</a></span></span>			<span class="comments-link"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/06/five-ways-to-burn-more-fat-tone-muscle-with-weight-training/#comments">1 Comment</a></span>
					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

		<div class="entry-content">
		<p>By Andrew Edwards</p>
<p>Many peoplehave the impression that the only benefit of weight training is to build muscle mass and get big. The truth is however, that weight training in its various forms is also great for burning fat and toning muscle.</p>
<figure data-shortcode="caption" id="attachment_4706" style="width: 310px" class="wp-caption alignright"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/weightlifting.jpg"><img class="size-medium wp-image-4706" src="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/weightlifting.jpg?w=300&h=198" alt="Image from Pixabay.com" width="300" height="198" srcset="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/weightlifting.jpg?w=300&h=198 300w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/weightlifting.jpg?w=600&h=396 600w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/08/weightlifting.jpg?w=150&h=99 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></a><figcaption class="wp-caption-text">Image from Pixabay.com</figcaption></figure>
<p>Even if you’ve never been to a gym or are opposed to the idea of lifting heavy weights amongst a crowd of sweaty guys please shelve your skepticism and read on.</p>
<p>Let’s take a look at five ways weight training can help you get to where you want to go when it comes to fitness:</p>
<p> <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/08/06/five-ways-to-burn-more-fat-tone-muscle-with-weight-training/#more-4705" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="screen-reader-text">Five Ways to Burn More Fat & Tone Muscle With Weight Training</span> <span class="meta-nav">→</span></a></p>
	</div><!-- .entry-content -->
	
	<footer class="entry-meta"><span class="tag-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/fitness-2/" rel="tag">fitness</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/muscle-tone/" rel="tag">muscle tone</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/physical-exercise/" rel="tag">Physical exercise</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/weight-loss-2/" rel="tag">weight loss</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/weight-training/" rel="tag">Weight training</a></span></footer></article><!-- #post-## -->

<article id="post-4653" class="post-4653 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-lifestyle tag-fall-asleep-faster tag-getting-more-sleep tag-sleep">
	
	<header class="entry-header">
				<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="cat-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/lifestyle/" rel="category tag">Lifestyle</a></span>
		</div>
		<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/fall-asleep-faster-and-sleep-better/" rel="bookmark">Fall Asleep Faster and Sleep Better</a></h1>
		<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="entry-date"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/fall-asleep-faster-and-sleep-better/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2015-07-13T15:37:55+00:00">July 13, 2015</time></a></span> <span class="byline"><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/author/capitalistpigletatt/" rel="author">Syndicated Article</a></span></span>			<span class="comments-link"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/fall-asleep-faster-and-sleep-better/#comments">1 Comment</a></span>
					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

		<div class="entry-content">
		<p><a href="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/sleep-comfort.jpg"><img class="alignright size-medium wp-image-4655" src="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/sleep-comfort.jpg?w=300&h=169" alt="sleep-comfort" width="300" height="169" srcset="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/sleep-comfort.jpg?w=300&h=169 300w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/sleep-comfort.jpg?w=600&h=338 600w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/sleep-comfort.jpg?w=150&h=84 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></a>By Dathan Hinrichs</p>
<p>Everyone needs their sleep. Good sleep reduces stress, recharges and repairs your body, makes you more alert, and just makes you feel good. For most people an average of seven to nine hours on sleep is fine, but everyone is different, some need more and some need less. If you are having troubles falling asleep or just getting a good night’s sleep it can have negative effects on your daily life.</p>
<p>There are many things you can do to help yourself fall asleep faster, and stay asleep. Your daily routine makes a big difference in your quality and quantity of sleep.</p>
<p> <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/fall-asleep-faster-and-sleep-better/#more-4653" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="screen-reader-text">Fall Asleep Faster and Sleep Better</span> <span class="meta-nav">→</span></a></p>
	</div><!-- .entry-content -->
	
	<footer class="entry-meta"><span class="tag-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/fall-asleep-faster/" rel="tag">fall asleep faster</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/getting-more-sleep/" rel="tag">getting more sleep</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/sleep/" rel="tag">sleep</a></span></footer></article><!-- #post-## -->

<article id="post-4647" class="post-4647 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-autoimmune-disease-2 category-diabetes category-lifestyle tag-causes-of-diabetes tag-genetics tag-iddm tag-inherited-diabetes tag-insulin-dependent-diabetes-mellitus tag-klinefelter-syndrome tag-pancreatitis tag-type-1-diabetes">
	
	<header class="entry-header">
				<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="cat-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/autoimmune-disease-2/" rel="category tag">Autoimmune Disease</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/diabetes/" rel="category tag">Diabetes</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/lifestyle/" rel="category tag">Lifestyle</a></span>
		</div>
		<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/causes-of-type-1-diabetes/" rel="bookmark">Causes of Type 1 Diabetes</a></h1>
		<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="entry-date"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/causes-of-type-1-diabetes/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2015-07-13T15:20:10+00:00">July 13, 2015</time></a></span> <span class="byline"><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/author/capitalistpigletatt/" rel="author">Syndicated Article</a></span></span>			<span class="comments-link"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/causes-of-type-1-diabetes/#respond">Leave a comment</a></span>
					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

		<div class="entry-content">
		<p>By Bill Jones</p>
<p>The elements that cause diabetes type one includes a large number of possibilities, from the environmental to autoimmune. Type one diabetes is often referred to as juvenile diabetes along with IDDM, and is an acronym for ‘Insulin Dependent Diabetes Mellitus,’ simply because the affected individual will have to be treated by means of insulin injections. <a href="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/diabetes-writing.jpg"><img class=" size-medium wp-image-4649 alignright" src="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/diabetes-writing.jpg?w=300&h=160" alt="diabetes-writing" width="300" height="160" srcset="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/diabetes-writing.jpg?w=300&h=160 300w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/diabetes-writing.jpg?w=600&h=320 600w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/07/diabetes-writing.jpg?w=150&h=80 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></a></p>
<p>This is the result of injury to most of the beta cells within your pancreas which usually creates insulin. In cases where these cells are destroyed, the pancreas will not be able to manufacture insulin any longer, and as a consequence it is going to have to be given via injections.</p>
<p> <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/07/13/causes-of-type-1-diabetes/#more-4647" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="screen-reader-text">Causes of Type 1 Diabetes</span> <span class="meta-nav">→</span></a></p>
	</div><!-- .entry-content -->
	
	<footer class="entry-meta"><span class="tag-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/causes-of-diabetes/" rel="tag">causes of diabetes</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/genetics/" rel="tag">genetics</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/iddm/" rel="tag">IDDM</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/inherited-diabetes/" rel="tag">inherited diabetes</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/insulin-dependent-diabetes-mellitus/" rel="tag">insulin dependent diabetes mellitus</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/klinefelter-syndrome/" rel="tag">Klinefelter syndrome</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/pancreatitis/" rel="tag">pancreatitis</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/type-1-diabetes/" rel="tag">type 1 diabetes</a></span></footer></article><!-- #post-## -->

<article id="post-4642" class="post-4642 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-cleansing-detox category-longevity-2 tag-alternative-medicine tag-alzheimers-disease tag-amino-acids tag-chelation-therapy tag-edta tag-heavy-metal-poisoning tag-lead tag-mercury tag-naturopathic-therapy">
	
	<header class="entry-header">
				<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="cat-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/cleansing-detox/" rel="category tag">Cleansing / Detox</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/longevity-2/" rel="category tag">Longevity</a></span>
		</div>
		<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/25/what-is-chelation-therapy/" rel="bookmark">What Is Chelation Therapy?</a></h1>
		<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="entry-date"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/25/what-is-chelation-therapy/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2015-06-25T17:50:48+00:00">June 25, 2015</time></a></span> <span class="byline"><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/author/capitalistpigletatt/" rel="author">Syndicated Article</a></span></span>			<span class="comments-link"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/25/what-is-chelation-therapy/#respond">Leave a comment</a></span>
					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

		<div class="entry-content">
		<p><a href="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/edta.jpg"><img class="alignleft wp-image-4644" src="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/edta.jpg?w=250&h=384" alt="EDTA" width="250" height="384" srcset="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/edta.jpg?w=250&h=384 250w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/edta.jpg?w=500&h=768 500w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/edta.jpg?w=98&h=150 98w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/edta.jpg?w=195&h=300 195w" sizes="(max-width: 250px) 100vw, 250px" /></a>By Longevity Medical</p>
<p>Chelation therapy is a method of medicine that is used to remove excess heavy metals from your bloodstream. This mainly refers to the excess mercury that can often exist inside your blood, which can cause harm to your cells, and therefore your body.</p>
<p>Chelation (pronounced kee-lay-shun) therapy is accomplished by intravenously introducing a chelating agent, Ethylene diamine tetra-acetic acid (EDTA), which is a synthetic amino acid. EDTA grabs onto the heavy metals and harmful minerals in the blood and allows them to be released in your urine. Sometimes another agent is used intravenously for extreme mercury detoxification, called DMPS. There are also oral chelating agents that are taken in pill form, and is an FDA-approved drug used for the treatment of lead poisoning. It is used to remove mercury from the body, combining with the metals in the bloodstream, then the metals and the drug are removed from the body by your kidneys and excreted through your urine.</p>
<p> <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/25/what-is-chelation-therapy/#more-4642" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="screen-reader-text">What Is Chelation Therapy?</span> <span class="meta-nav">→</span></a></p>
	</div><!-- .entry-content -->
	
	<footer class="entry-meta"><span class="tag-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/alternative-medicine/" rel="tag">alternative medicine</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/alzheimers-disease/" rel="tag">Alzheimer's disease</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/amino-acids/" rel="tag">amino acids</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/chelation-therapy/" rel="tag">chelation therapy</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/edta/" rel="tag">edta</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/heavy-metal-poisoning/" rel="tag">heavy metal poisoning</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/lead/" rel="tag">lead</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/mercury/" rel="tag">mercury</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/naturopathic-therapy/" rel="tag">naturopathic therapy</a></span></footer></article><!-- #post-## -->

<article id="post-4636" class="post-4636 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-addiction category-aging category-food-nutrition category-heart-health category-lifestyle category-longevity-2 category-mental-health tag-anxiety tag-caffeine tag-caffeine-addiction tag-caffeine-withdrawal-symptoms tag-coffee tag-headaches tag-heartburn tag-high-blood-pressure tag-musle-stiffness tag-nausea tag-rapid-heart-beat tag-restlessness">
	
	<header class="entry-header">
				<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="cat-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/addiction/" rel="category tag">Addiction</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/aging/" rel="category tag">Aging</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/food-nutrition/" rel="category tag">Food / Nutrition</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/heart-health/" rel="category tag">Heart Health</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/lifestyle/" rel="category tag">Lifestyle</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/longevity-2/" rel="category tag">Longevity</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/mental-health/" rel="category tag">Mental Health</a></span>
		</div>
		<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/22/the-evils-of-caffeine/" rel="bookmark">The Evils of Caffeine</a></h1>
		<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="entry-date"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/22/the-evils-of-caffeine/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2015-06-22T17:14:38+00:00">June 22, 2015</time></a></span> <span class="byline"><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/author/capitalistpigletatt/" rel="author">Syndicated Article</a></span></span>			<span class="comments-link"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/22/the-evils-of-caffeine/#comments">2 Comments</a></span>
					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

		<div class="entry-content">
		<p><a href="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/evil-coffee.jpg"><img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-4637" src="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/evil-coffee.jpg?w=300&h=243" alt="evil-coffee" width="300" height="243" srcset="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/evil-coffee.jpg?w=300&h=243 300w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/evil-coffee.jpg?w=600&h=486 600w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/06/evil-coffee.jpg?w=150&h=122 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></a>By Nikoletta Ven</p>
<p>Charles Czeisler, a neuroscientist and sleep expert from Harvard Medical School explains: “When the nature of work changed from a schedule built around the sun to an indoor job timed by a clock, humans had to adapt. The widespread use of caffeinated food and drink – in combination with the invention of electric light – allowed people to cope with a work schedule set by the clock, not by daylight or the natural sleep cycle.” In addition, scientific studies have shown that the power boost of caffeine is connected with its interference with adenosine – a chemical in our bodies, which has hypnotic effect and works as a natural sleeping pill. Caffeine actually ceases adenosine and in this way our alertness gets increased and our sleep habits are disrupted. As we all know, there’s no such thing as a free lunch and we pay for this extra wakefulness.</p>
<p> <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/06/22/the-evils-of-caffeine/#more-4636" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="screen-reader-text">The Evils of Caffeine</span> <span class="meta-nav">→</span></a></p>
	</div><!-- .entry-content -->
	
	<footer class="entry-meta"><span class="tag-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/anxiety/" rel="tag">anxiety</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/caffeine/" rel="tag">Caffeine</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/caffeine-addiction/" rel="tag">Caffeine addiction</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/caffeine-withdrawal-symptoms/" rel="tag">caffeine withdrawal symptoms</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/coffee/" rel="tag">Coffee</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/headaches/" rel="tag">headaches</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/heartburn/" rel="tag">Heartburn</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/high-blood-pressure/" rel="tag">high blood pressure</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/musle-stiffness/" rel="tag">musle stiffness</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/nausea/" rel="tag">nausea</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/rapid-heart-beat/" rel="tag">rapid heart beat</a><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/tag/restlessness/" rel="tag">restlessness</a></span></footer></article><!-- #post-## -->

<article id="post-4618" class="post-4618 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-food-nutrition category-lifestyle tag-alternative-health tag-eating-for-insomina tag-food tag-health tag-natural-health tag-nutrition tag-sleep">
	
	<header class="entry-header">
				<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="cat-links"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/food-nutrition/" rel="category tag">Food / Nutrition</a>, <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/category/lifestyle/" rel="category tag">Lifestyle</a></span>
		</div>
		<h1 class="entry-title"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/05/28/the-best-foods-for-a-good-nights-sleep/" rel="bookmark">The Best Foods for a Good Night’s Sleep</a></h1>
		<div class="entry-meta">
			<span class="entry-date"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/05/28/the-best-foods-for-a-good-nights-sleep/" rel="bookmark"><time class="entry-date" datetime="2015-05-28T16:29:23+00:00">May 28, 2015</time></a></span> <span class="byline"><span class="author vcard"><a class="url fn n" href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/author/capitalistpigletatt/" rel="author">Syndicated Article</a></span></span>			<span class="comments-link"><a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/05/28/the-best-foods-for-a-good-nights-sleep/#comments">1 Comment</a></span>
					</div><!-- .entry-meta -->
	</header><!-- .entry-header -->

		<div class="entry-content">
		<p><a href="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/sleepingman.jpg"><img class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-4619" src="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/sleepingman.jpg?w=300&h=200" alt="SleepingMan" width="300" height="200" srcset="https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/sleepingman.jpg?w=300&h=200 300w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/sleepingman.jpg?w=600&h=400 600w, https://holistichealthliving.files.wordpress.com/2015/05/sleepingman.jpg?w=150&h=100 150w" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px" /></a>By Dr. Isaac Eliaz</p>
<p>What you eat can drastically affect how you sleep, so in order to get a good night’s rest, it is essential to choose foods that calm your mind and body rather than those that stimulate you. Certain types of foods will naturally promote rest and relaxation, particularly those that contain tryptophan – the amino acid that the body uses to make serotonin, the neurotransmitter that slows nerve activity within your brain.<br />
 <a href="https://holistichealthliving.wordpress.com/2015/05/28/the-best-foods-for-a-good-nights-sleep/#more-4618" class="more-link">Continue reading <span class="screen-reader-text">The Best Foods for a Good Night’s Sleep</span> <span class="meta-nav">→</span></a></p>
	</div><!-- .entry-content -->
